summary: A fired South Korean agent and a deserted North Korean spy meet by chance after six years and start a business partnership, each with the intention of stealing information from the other.
cast: Song Kang-Ho|Dong-won Gang|Seung-ik Baek|Yun-seo Choi|Kyeong-min Go|Jeon Gook-Hwan|Su-ho Ha|Seung-do Han|Se-hwan Im|Jasmine|In-gi Jeong|Jae-won Kim|Jin-yong Kim|Mi-jun Kim|Myeong-hun Kim|Sun-ae Kim|Yang-seong Kim|Yeong-wung Kim|Chang-Seok Ko|Jae-ryong Lee|Jeong-min Lee|Myeong-ok Lee|Nak-jun Lee|So-yoon Lee|Geon Moon|Sang-baek Nam|Chan-wu Oh|Hyuk-kwon Park|Min-wu Park|Soo-Young Park|Ji-won Seo|Myeong-seok Seo|Seung-yong Sin|Soo-gang Sin|Jeong Yoo|Chang-suk Yu|Cha Yub|Hee-seok Yun
keywords: two word title|korea|south korea|south korean|government agent
title: Ui-hyeong-je
